EmailTemplate.name: Direct Sales Moble v1.0.6 Release Notes
EmailTemplate.subject: Important: Direct Sales Mobile Version 1.0.6 Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Version 1.0.6 of the Direct Sales Mobile App has been posted to the Comcast App Catalog and can be downloaded at your convenience. The current version installed on your device will continue to work until you are able to install the latest version.
The app freeze issue that is occurring with the following functions will be addressed with the 1.0.6 release:
Creating dispositions. Creating a playlist. Navigating the turf / playlist. Searching off-turf. Creating a disposition for an off-turf address. General usability issues, that occur while the sync is in-progress, will also be addressed with this release. Attached are detailed release notes for the above fixes as well as step by step instructions to install version 1.0.6 of the Direct Sales Mobile app.
You can also find the release notes and job aid by clicking the below links and selecting "view file":
Release Notes: https://onecomcast.my.salesforce.com/015G000000Cc1ND
Downloading & Installing the App: https://onecomcast.my.salesforce.com/015G000000CbpVu
Thank You
